name: Eldritch Claws
text: Who needs magic weapons? Eldritch tricks are no match for your bestial ferocity.
prerequisites: Str 15, natural weapons, base attack bonus +6.
benefit: You natural weapons are considered both magic and silver for purpose of overcoming damage reduction.
staminaText: As long as you have 1 stamina point in your stamina pool, your claws are also considered to be cold iron weapons for the purpose of overcoming damage reduction.
text_zh: 谁需要魔法武器？鬼魅的把戏无法阻挡你的兽性之力。
benefit_zh: 你的天生武器在克服伤害减免时同时被视为魔法和银。
staminaText_zh: 只要耐力池里还有至少1点耐力，你的天生武器在克服伤害减免时视为寒铁武器。
